## Something something
```{r}
library(tidyr)
library(RMySQL)
conn <- dbConnect(MySQL(), dbname = "bike_data", port = 3306)
csv_list <- scan("csvFiles.txt", what= "character", sep="\n")

dbWriteTable(conn, name = "bike_data", value = csv_list[1])
for(i in 2:length(csv_list)){
  dbWriteTable(conn, name = "bike_data", append = TRUE, value = csv_list[i])
}
dbGetQuery(conn, "SELECT * from bike_data LIMIT 10")
```
